StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetDailyReportAc.vityObjec.ves]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int, @FiscalYear int = 0, @Month int = 0, @BeginDate date.me = null, @EndDate date.me = null AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @Organiza.onType as Varchar(3)
SET @Organiza.onID = COALESCE(@Organiza.onID, 900) SET @Organiza.onType = (SELECT ORGANIZATION_TYPE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID)
SELECT * INTO #SUBORGS FROM dbo.GetOrgHierarchy(@Organiza.onID)
DECLARE @ReportType AS VARCHAR(10) DECLARE @MonthBeginDate date.me
IF ((@FiscalYear > 0) AND (@Month > 0)) BEGIN SET @ReportType = 'BY_MONTH' SET @MonthBeginDate = CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), @Month) + '/01/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), @FiscalYear)) SET @BeginDate = NULL SET @EndDate = NULL END ELSE BEGIN SET @ReportType = 'DATE_RANGE' SET @MonthBeginDate = @BeginDate END
SELECT CASE @Organiza.onType WHEN 'H' THEN SO.REG_ID WHEN 'R' THEN SO.DIST_ID WHEN 'D' THEN SO.RS_ID WHEN 'RS' THEN SO.RSS_ID END AS ORGANIZATION_ID, SUM(COALESCE(AO.CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE, 0)) AS CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE, --- dbo.GetContractObjec.ve (RSS.ORGANIZATION_ID, @FiscalYear, @Month, RSS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE) AS CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE, SUM(COALESCE(AO.NWAS_OBJECTIVE, 0)) AS NWAS_OBJECTIVE, SUM(COALESCE(AO.INTERVIEWS_OBJECTIVE, 0)) AS INTERVIEWS_OBJECTIVE INTO #DAILY_REPORT FROM #SUBORGS SO LEFT OUTER JOIN ACTIVITY_OBJECTIVE AO ON (SO.ORG_ID = AO.ORGANIZATION_ID AND AO.FISCAL_YEAR = CASE @ReportType WHEN 'BY_MONTH' THEN @FiscalYear WHEN 'DATE_RANGE' THEN AO.FISCAL_YEAR END AND AO.MONTH = CASE @ReportType WHEN 'BY_MONTH' THEN @Month WHEN 'DATE_RANGE' THEN AO.MONTH END AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, COALESCE(@BeginDate, CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), AO.MONTH) + '/1/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), AO.FISCAL_YEAR))), CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), AO.MONTH) + '/1/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), AO.FISCAL_YEAR))) >= 0 AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), AO.MONTH) + '/1/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), AO.FISCAL_YEAR)), COALESCE(@EndDate, CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), AO.MONTH) + '/1/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), AO.FISCAL_YEAR)))) >= 0) WHERE SO.ORG_TYPE = 'RSS' AND (DATEDIFF(MONTH, SO.EFFECTIVE_DATE, @MonthBeginDate) >= 0) AND @Organiza.onID = CASE @Organiza.onType WHEN 'H' THEN @Organiza.onID WHEN 'R' THEN SO.REG_ID WHEN 'D' THEN SO.DIST_ID WHEN 'RS' THEN SO.RS_ID END GROUP BY CASE @Organiza.onType WHEN 'H' THEN SO.REG_ID WHEN 'R' THEN SO.DIST_ID WHEN 'D' THEN SO.RS_ID WHEN 'RS' THEN SO.RSS_ID END
SELECT DO.* FROM #DAILY_REPORT DO INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON DO.ORGANIZATION_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY RO.NAME
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #DAILY_REPORT DROP TABLE #SUBORGS
SET NOCOUNT OFF
